company_commercial_names: prairie school foundation | prairie foundation | prairie school
locations: us, united states, iowa, cedar rapids, 52403, 76th avenue southwest, 401, 41.903318, -91.66925002321128
short_description: prairie school foundation is a community foundation based in cedar rapids, iowa, united states.
long_description: the prairie school foundation was the first public school foundation in iowa. the prairie school foundation, established in 1981, is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit corporation dedicated to enriching the lives of all college community school district students and making a positive difference in their education. the college community school district is a growing school district serving approximately 6,000 students from linn, benton and johnson counties. the prairie school foundation is chartered by the state of iowa and is governed by a volunteer board. in addition to fundraising, the foundation seeks to encourage prairie school alumni to maintain an active relationship with their classmates and the school district as it evolves in the delivery of an education that will enable students to meet the challenge of thriving in an ever-changing world. the foundation also advocates for the college community school district focusing on its residents, businesses and organizations serving the community. the foundation actively works as a partner with the school district to identify needs including equipment or materials in the classrooms, or for the enhancement of extra-curricular activities.
